original_query: SELECT MIN(Country.CountryId) FROM Country, City, Person, Forum_hasMember_Person, Forum, Post, Comment, Comment_hasTag_Tag, Tag, TagClass WHERE City.isPartOf_CountryId = Country.CountryId AND Person.isLocatedIn_CityId = City.CityId AND Forum_hasMember_Person.PersonId = Person.PersonId AND Forum.ForumId = Forum_hasMember_Person.ForumId AND Post.Forum_containerOfId = Forum.ForumId AND Comment.replyOf_PostId = Post.PostId AND Comment_hasTag_Tag.CommentId = Comment.CommentId AND Tag.TagId = Comment_hasTag_Tag.TagId AND Tag.hasType_TagClassId = TagClass.TagClassId
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM City AS City
CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM Country AS Country
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E1 AS SELECT * FROM E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E1 WHERE E2.isPartOf_CountryId=E1.CountryId)
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM Person AS Person
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM Forum_hasMember_Person AS Forum_hasMember_Person
CREATE VIEW E6 AS SELECT * FROM Post AS Post
CREATE VIEW E5 AS SELECT * FROM Forum AS Forum
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E6E5 AS SELECT * FROM E6 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E5 WHERE E6.forum_ContainerOfId=E5.ForumId)
CREATE VIEW E7 AS SELECT * FROM Comment AS Comment
CREATE VIEW E8 AS SELECT * FROM Comment_hasTag_Tag AS Comment_hasTag_Tag
CREATE VIEW E9 AS SELECT * FROM Tag AS Tag
CREATE VIEW E10 AS SELECT * FROM TagClass AS TagClass
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E9E10 AS SELECT * FROM E9 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E10 WHERE E9.hasType_TagClassId=E10.TagClassId)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E8E9E10 AS SELECT * FROM E8 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E9E10 WHERE E8.TagId=E9E10.TagId)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E7E8E9E10 AS SELECT * FROM E7 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E8E9E10 WHERE E7.CommentId=E8E9E10.CommentId)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E6E5E7E8E9E10 AS SELECT * FROM E6E5 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E7E8E9E10 WHERE E6E5.PostId=E7E8E9E10.replyOf_PostId)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E4E6E5E7E8E9E10 AS SELECT * FROM E4 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E6E5E7E8E9E10 WHERE E4.ForumId=E6E5E7E8E9E10.forum_ContainerOfId)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E3E4E6E5E7E8E9E10 AS SELECT * FROM E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4E6E5E7E8E9E10 WHERE E3.PersonId=E4E6E5E7E8E9E10.PersonId)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E1E3E4E6E5E7E8E9E10 AS SELECT MIN(isPartOf_CountryId) AS EXPR$0 FROM E2E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3E4E6E5E7E8E9E10 WHERE E2E1.CityId=E3E4E6E5E7E8E9E10.isLocatedIn_CityId)
SELECT * FROM E2E1E3E4E6E5E7E8E9E10
